---
title: "News"
page-layout: full
format:
  html:
    toc: false
    include-in-header:
      text: |
        <style>
          /* ---------- Page width ---------- */
          .page-full .content{max-width:1100px;margin-inline:auto;}

          /* ---------- Top cards (2 only) ---------- */
          .news-boxes{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;gap:1.25rem;margin:0 0 2.2rem 0;}
          .news-card{
            flex:1 1 360px;padding:1.25rem 1.5rem;background:#fff;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-radius:14px;
            box-shadow:0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.05);display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-between
          }
          .news-card h4{margin:0 0 .35rem 0;font-size:1.05rem;font-weight:700}
          .news-card p{margin:.2rem 0;color:#333;line-height:1.55}
          .btn{
            display:inline-block;margin-top:.8rem;padding:.45rem .95rem;background:#2986cc;color:#fff;border-radius:8px;
            text-decoration:none;font-weight:700;border:none;cursor:pointer;transition:background .15s ease-in-out
          }
          .btn:hover{background:#1f6db3}

          /* ---------- Timeline base ---------- */
          .timeline{position:relative;border-left:3px solid #2986cc;padding-left:1.5rem;margin-left:1rem}
          .timeline-item{position:relative;margin:0 0 2rem 0}
          .timeline-item h4{margin:0 0 .35rem 0;font-size:1.15rem;font-weight:800; position:relative; line-height:1.25}
          .timeline-item strong{display:block;margin:.15rem 0 .15rem;font-weight:700}
          .timeline-item p{margin:0;color:#555}

          /* 旧的点禁用，避免与标题不对齐 */
          .timeline-item::before{ display:none; }

          /* 将圆点固定在 h4 中线，始终与标题对齐 */
          .timeline-item h4::before{
            content:"";
            position:absolute;
            left:-1.63rem;         /* 若与左侧竖线轻微偏差，可微调 -1.55rem ~ -1.85rem */
            top:50%;
            transform:translateY(-50%);
            width:.8rem;height:.8rem;border-radius:50%;
            background:#2986cc;border:2px solid #fff;box-shadow:0 0 0 3px #2986cc55;
          }

          /* ---------- Highlight effect (no jump) ---------- */
          .timeline-item.is-highlight{
            background:#e9f3ff;border-radius:8px;padding-left:.6rem;
            animation: hi-bg .25s ease-out 1
          }
          .timeline-item.is-highlight h4,
          .timeline-item.is-highlight strong{color:#0b61c3}
          .timeline-item.is-highlight h4::before{
            background:#0b61c3;box-shadow:0 0 0 5px rgba(41,134,204,.28);animation:pulse 1.2s ease-out 2
          }
          @keyframes pulse{
            0%{transform:translateY(-50%) scale(1)}
            50%{transform:translateY(-50%) scale(1.25)}
            100%{transform:translateY(-50%) scale(1)}
          }
          @keyframes hi-bg{
            from{background:#dff0ff} to{background:#e9f3ff}
          }
        </style>
---

<script>
  // 仅高亮，不跳转
  const clearHi = () =>
    document.querySelectorAll('.timeline-item.is-highlight')
      .forEach(el => el.classList.remove('is-highlight'));

  document.querySelectorAll('.js-mark').forEach(btn => {
    btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const id = btn.getAttribute('data-target');
      const span = document.getElementById(id);
      if(!span) return;
      const item = span.closest('.timeline-item');
      if(!item) return;
      clearHi();
      item.classList.add('is-highlight');
      setTimeout(()=> item.classList.remove('is-highlight'), 2500); // 想保持高亮可删掉这一行
    });
  });
</script>
